WorkItem.Description:
Just found out if you don't close a url string and end your bbcode text the app hangs just spinning the CPU.

I had mistakenly not closed the last url tag (TrainInstructions.xaml) like this:

```
<mui:BBCodeBlock Margin="5" BBCode="Once all data sets are created (or loaded from disk), use the [url=/Pages/Train.xaml]Train Tab[/url] to start training. Details on training and performance can be found [url=/Pages/TrainInstructions.xaml"></mui:BBCodeBlock>
```

Prob not high priority but thought I'd mention it.
WorkItem.Summary: Hang when BBCodeBlock url is not closed

Comments.Message: Resolved with changeset 110096: fixed BBCodeBlock hang when opening tag not properly closed before end of string
